Events.Name: Attitude Reunion Keychain Contest
Events.Description: Collect and spend Attitude Reunion Keychains to earn over 200,125 Attitude Reunion Ingots and other AWESOME prizes!

Events.Name: Attitude Reunion Kick Off Faction Contest!
Events.Description: Work with your Faction while using the Ric Flair "Co-Owner" to win up to 6 Co-Owner Token in the Attitude Reunion Kick Off Blitz Faction Contest!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Work with your Faction while using the Ric Flair "Co-Owner" to win up to 6 Co-Owner Token in the Attitude Reunion Kick Off Blitz Faction Contest!

Methods.Description: Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode
Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Normal Mode with Ric Flair "Co-Owner"
Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode
Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Hard Mode with Ric Flair "Co-Owner"
Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode
Defeat the Boss in Attitude Reunion Kick Off Gauntlet Blitz Hell Mode with Ric Flair "Co-Owner"

Events.Name: Showdown Faction Contest
Events.Description: COMPETE AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL! EQUIP AND UPGRADE THE SHOWDOWN PERKS IN YOUR ROSTER SCREEN!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Compete alongside your Faction in the Attitude Reunion Showdown Tournament  to win AWESOME rewards!

Methods.Description: Win an ATTITUDE REUNION Showdown Match

Events.Name: Attitude Reunion Contest
Events.Description: Make progress by earning Attitude Reunion Ingots, increasing the talent of Ric Flair "Co-Owner" and MORE. Prizes include the BRAND NEW Chyna "Ninth Wonder Of The World" and many more valuable items!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Make progress by earning Attitude Reunion Ingots, increasing the talent of Ric Flair "Co-Owner" and MORE. Prizes include the BRAND NEW Chyna "Ninth Wonder Of The World" and many more valuable items!

Methods.Description: Increase the talent of Ric Flair "Co-Owner" by 1
Spend 1 Attitude Reunion Faction Vault Vol. 3 Coin
Spend 1 Attitude Reunion Faction Vault Vol. 2 Coin
Spend 1 Attitude Reunion Faction Vault Vol. 4 Coin
Spend 1 Attitude Reunion Faction Vault Vol. 1 Coin

Rewards.Reward: Chyna "Ninth Wonder of the World" 3 Star Gold

Events.Name: Kickoff Talent Up
Events.Description: Kickoff the Attitude Reunion Contest by increasing your Roster talent to win AWESOME rewards including Steve Austin "Austin 3:16" at 3-Star Gold!

Methods.Description: Evolve or Enhance a 2 Star Superstar
Evolve or Enhance a 3 Star Superstar
Evolve, Enhance or Fuse Up a 4-Star Superstar

Events.Name: Showdown Solo Contest
Events.Description: COMPETE AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL! EQUIP AND UPGRADE THE SHOWDOWN PERKS IN YOUR ROSTER SCREEN!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Compete in the Attitude Reunion Showdown Tournament to try to win Eddie Guerrero at up to 4-Star Bronze, Showdown Coins, Attitude Reunion Ingots and much more!

Methods.Description: Win an ATTITUDE REUNION Showdown Match

Events.Name: Attitude Reunion Week 1 Guide
Events.Description: Follow the guide to participate in what happens in this week's Attitude Reunion.
Events.EventMarqueeText: Follow the guide to participate in what happens in this week's Attitude Reunion.

Attitude Reunion - Win Blitz Boss fight in Hard Mode
Attitude Reunion - Win the Kevin Nash Tour Boss fight in Hard Mode
Attitude Reunion - Win the Rock Tour Boss fight in Hard Mode
Attitude Reunion - Win the Big Show Tour Boss fight in Hard Mode
Attitude Reunion - Win the Mankind Tour Boss fight in Hard Mode
